title: How to donate to Brown University students after shooting
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The Rhode Island Blood Center saw more than 100 first-time donors and a 265 percent increase in donations after the shooting.
A community member looks at flowers, notes and mementos in a makeshift memorial display sitting in front of Brown University's Van Wickle gates, in Providence, R.

title: Bruins bring holiday cheer to local hospitals during annual toy delivery event
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "I think everybody, every kid, should have gifts and should be happy this time of year.
So that we can do something to give it back to some kids, I think it's very special.
” The Bruins visited pediatric patients across several local hospitals on Monday.

title: Man arrested, accused of killing girlfriend in Quincy apartment
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Crime Guiovani Garcia Chagollan, 34, pleaded not guilty to murder and assault with a dangerous weapon in Quincy District Court Monday, Norfolk County District Attorney Michael Morrissey said.

By Molly Farrar December 15, 2025 | 5:49 PM 1 minute to read A Quincy man is facing murder charges after his 26-year-old girlfriend was found dead in an apartment complex Saturday night, prosecutors said.
Guiovani Garcia Chagollan, 34, pleaded not guilty to murder and assault with a dangerous weapon in Quincy District Court Monday, Norfolk County District Attorney Michael Morrissey said.

title: 2 Seaport restaurants to close and lay off 84 employees
author: Katelyn Umholtz
